channel.title: INNATURE
channel.description: We sell latex mattresses, latex pillows, slat beds and other organic bedding in NZ

item.title: INNATURE Organic Latex mattresses. Medium or Medium Soft or Soft.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
"BALANCE" - Medium - best selling mattress!

Composition: The core is 150mm Natural Latex medium-density measures 80-85kg/m3 (in contrast with the medium soft mattress or soft density latex core), 500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding natural latex core), then 100% cotton inner cover encase all materials , all layers are hand stitched together (no glues are used). Them this mattress finished with unbleached organic cotton 45% & hemp  55% fabric quilted with NZ 500gsm NZ wool wadding cover with zipper. Most suitable for people who prefer supportive mattress with some give to accommodate hip curve and shoulder - the balance between support and comfort.

"comfi" - Medium Soft

Composition: The core is 150mm Natural Latex medium soft-density 75kg/m3 (in contrast with the medium mattress, which has a medium-density latex core or soft core), 500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding natural latex core), then 100% cotton inner cover encase all materials , all layers are hand stitched together (no glues are used). Them this mattress finished with unbleached organic cotton 45% & hemp  55% fabric quilted with NZ 500gsm NZ wool wadding cover with zipper. Most suitable for people who prefer contour support in a mattress with a good give to accommodate a hip curve, shoulder - and take your body line.

"cloud" - Soft

Composition: The core is 150mm Natural Latex Soft-density 60-65kg/m3 (in contrast with the medium mattress, which has a medium-density latex core), 500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding natural latex core), then 100% cotton inner cover encase all materials , all layers are hand stitched together (no glues are used). Them this mattress finished with unbleached organic cotton 45% & hemp  55% fabric quilted with NZ 500gsm NZ wool wadding cover with zipper. Most suitable for people who prefer a gentle contour support in a mattress with a good give to accommodate a hip curve, shoulder and take your body line with minimum pressure points. Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.
item.category: Natural Latex Mattresses and Coco Latex Mattresses

item.title: Premium Organic wool Mattress Overlay
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Pure organic sheep’s wool fill in 100% organic cotton cover. Beautifully quilted.
  • Naturally hypoallergenic & dust mite resistant
  • Eliminates thermal imbalance
  • Good protection for you mattress
  • Calms the body and lowers the heart rate
  • Helps to relieve back pains, arthritis pains, and painful pressure points
  • Naturally flame resistant and safe for kids
  • Biodegradable and healthy for the planet
item.excerpt:encoded:
Cozy and warm! Ads comfort and softness to the mattress! Excellent quality! Proudly made in NZ.
Elastic on the corner. Can be machine washed: gentle wash with Eco wool detergent. No spin, dry on the line.

item.title: Organic cotton sheet sets “ECOLINEN”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Single size: fitted sheet 91 x 190 x 35cm, flat sheet 188 x 260cm, 1 pillowcase 48 x 73cm King Single size: fitted sheet 107 x 203 x 40cm, flat sheet 205 x 260cm, 1 pillowcase 48 x 73cm Queen size: fitted sheet 152 x 203 x 50cm, flat sheet 260 x 280cm, 2 pillowcase 48 x 73cm King size: fitted sheet 168 x 203 x 50cm, flat sheet 265 x 290cm, 2 pillowcase 48 x 73cm Super King size: fitted sheet 183 x 203 x 50cm, flat sheet 265 x 290cm, 2 pillowcase 48 x 73cm
<address>*** By request we can remake fitted sheet to fit any custom size ($20 charge)</address>
item.excerpt:encoded:
Available in bright white and natural stone certified organic cotton.  See size chart for your size. Set includes:
  • Fitted sheet – elasticised all the way around for ease of fitting on to your bed,
  • Flat sheet and pillowcases.
These crisp, thick organic cotton sheets are wonderful to sleep in. Try them, if you don’t like them we give a 30 day money-back guarantee on all our sheets. For a sustainable lifestyle, choose quality certified organic cotton bed linen.

item.title: Organic cotton Duvet sets “ECOLINEN”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Single size: duvet cover 140 x 210cm, 1 pillowcase 48 x 73cm Queen size: duvet cover 210 x 210cm , 2 pillowcase 48 x 73cm King Single or Double size: duvet cover 180 x 210cm , 1 pillowcase 48 x 73cm King size: duvet cover 245 x 210cm , 2 pillowcase 48 x 73cm
*** By you request we can remake fitted sheet to fit any custom size ($20 charge)
item.excerpt:encoded: The ecoLinen organic cotton reversible quilt cover set is thick and crisp with 7cm flanges and button closures.  Made exclusively for us from pure certified organic cotton.  Matching stone pillowcase pairs complete this ‘stone one side’ and ‘white the other side’organic cotton quilt cover set.  Our all white quilt cover set includes white pillowcases – classic white always works! Simple design with flange around three sides Button closures Deep pocket to slip inner quilt into Set includes pillowcase for single and pair of pillowcases for larger sizes

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:2:{s:6:"colour";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:6:"Colour";s:5:"value";s:13:"White | Stone";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}s:4:"size";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:4:"Size";s:5:"value";s:49:"Single size | Queen size | King size | Super King";s:8:"position";s:1:"1";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Premium Quality “Princess wool” Organic Wool Duvet inners
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Pure organic sheep’s carded wool filling
  • 100% organic cotton cover
  • Naturally hypoallergetic and safe
  • Resistant to dust mites
  • Eliminates thermal imbalance
  • Lightweight all-seasons duvets
  • Proudly made in New Zealand
Can come in all sizes (including custom sizes) and in variety of weights.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Our bodies are constantly fighting the toxins found in the products around us. With Organic Duvets inner, you help to create environments in your bed that allow the body’s defense system a change to recuperate. Organic products are good for you and your family as well as environment. We also sell Organic pillows, mattress overlays/protectors and Organic cotton bedding.

Better sleep naturally…

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:2:{s:6:"weight";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:6:"Weight";s:5:"value";s:31:"500gsm | Combo: 300gsm + 200gsm";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}s:4:"size";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:4:"Size";s:5:"value";s:128:"Single size 140 x 210cm | Double size 180 x 210cm | Queen size 210 x 210cm | King size 245 x 210cm | Super King size 265 x 210cm";s:8:"position";s:1:"1";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: “Silk Sensation” Duvets inner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The combination of Mulberry silk, covered in quality cotton not only serves to produce extremely soft hypoallergenic, and bed bug resistant bedding; it more importantly regulates body temperature by moving away the humidity and moisture that causes people to feel overheated while they are sleeping. The Silk Sensation™, silk filled duvet inner is covered with a pure white 275 thread count cotton cover which is finished with a spiral quilting pattern and piping edges. Caring for your silk duvet A Silk Sensations duvet will last 10 years or longer if properly cared for. Dry cleaning is recommended, and then only occasionally. Use with a duvet cover and top sheet and air out periodically. Spot clean with Sunlight soap for local spillages or marks. A silk duvet is, without a doubt, the most practical, easy-to-care-for duvet on the market.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Come in 2 different weights: summer and winter. They Can be clipped together for cold WINTER nights - warmest duvet ever!
More recently, silk’s natural hypoallergenic qualities have come to be increasingly appreciated across the modern world. Silk bedding is a great blessing to all allergy sufferers who are prone to asthma blocked sinuses or other hay fever-like symptoms. Many people who are allergic to dust or house mites which are often found in ordinary bedding materials such as down, feathers and wool, will find silk will not accommodate these mites.

Save 20%!!!";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}s:4:"size";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:4:"Size";s:5:"value";s:140:"Single size 140 x 210cm | King Single/Double size 180 x 210cm | Queen size 210 x 210cm | King size 245 x 210cm | Super King size 265 x 210cm";s:8:"position";s:1:"1";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: 100% Natural Latex pillow
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Size is 40 x 60cm
item.excerpt:encoded: 100% Natural Latex pillow in 100% cotton casing. Comes in 2 different firmness: Soft (suitable for back sleeper and women) and Firm (preferred by side sleepers and men as they have wider shoulders) .

item.title: Organic Buckwheat Pillows
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded:
• Organic cotton/hemp casing.
  • Organic NZ grown buckwheat husk.
  • Very comfortable
  • Suitable for people with neck problems
  • Excellent support
  • Can be re-shaped to right height
Can come in different sizes.

item.title: INNATURE Organic cover cotton and wool pillow
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Organic cotton and hemp fabric cover, layers of 100% naturally washed NZ carded wool and unbleached Australian cotton. Standard size 48 x 70cm. Adult thickness can be customised: thin, medium (most popular - 3 layers of wool and 2 layer of cotton) or thick pillow. Child thickness (2 layers of wool and 1 layer of cotton).
item.excerpt:encoded: This pillow made of 3 layers 500gsm NZ eco wool and 2 layers of cotton. Can come in different thickness. Very popular pillow. Provides support and comfort.

item.title: "NEW CLASSIC" SLAT BED FRAME
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
Comes with solid slats system. Can be also made with flexible slats for additional $175 (queen and double sizes), $200 (king and super king sizes).
Can come with very elegant matching Side Tables.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Straight lines, nothing distracting…
This design appeals to people who love clear lines… Solid timber!
Beautifully made out of high quality furniture grade timber.
Every INNATURE bed frame comes fitted with very strong German hardware and a "T" profile middle rail, finished with Natural oil. Solid Pine Slats

item.title: "VIDA" Kids' bed frame
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
Can be made in different height. Usual height for kid's bed frame is 32cm but it can be made 35cm if it is chosen for a teenager or 37cm if used with a trundler.
Can also come with a drawer (additional $200) or trundler (additional $295 for the frame + futon mattress of your choice for additional price)
item.excerpt:encoded:
Very popular design for kids. Simple and elegant.
Can also come with a drawe or trundler bed.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:2:{s:23:"size-inner-measurements";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:25:"Size (Inner Measurements)";s:5:"value";s:118:"Vida. 92 x 193cm (inner measurements) | Vida. 92 x 203cm (inner measurements) | Vida. 107 x 203cm (inner measurements)";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}s:14:"timber-options";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:14:"Timber options";s:5:"value";s:17:"Pine | Macrocarpa";s:8:"position";s:1:"1";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Organic Coco Wool Bassinet mattress
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Composition: the core is made of  30mm rubberised with natural latex coconut coir (coco) fibre core,  500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding coco fibre core) and  finished with unbleached organic cotton & hemp fabric quilted with NZ 500gsm eco wool wadding cover.
 
Recommended to be used with Organic cotton sheet set ($60).
Sizes: 400mm x 800mm or 400mm x 760mm or 380mm x 800mm or any custom size and shape ! If you use a Baby monitor, please, know that it is a piece of plastic which doesn't breath and will reflect the moisture back into the mattress. It can be a reason for moldy patch to appear. To avoid it please make a woolen cover for the monitor pad or put it under woolen blanket and under the mattress You will need to air regular those items.
item.excerpt:encoded: Medium Firm grade mattress 50mm thick. Featuring a Coconut Coir Fibre Core. Our Medium Firm mattress gives excellent spinal support created by an ingenious layering of natural materials.

item.title: Organic Latex Wool Bassinet mattress. Best selling option!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Composition: the core is made of 50mm natural organic latex core of medium density and  finished with unbleached organic cotton & hemp fabric quilted with NZ 250gsm eco wool wadding cover.
Sizes: 400mm x 800mm or 400mm x 760mm or 380mm x 800mm or any custom size and shape. Recommended to be used with Organic cotton sheet set ($60). In case of ordering oval shape custom made mattress, please, post to us a template made of newspaper or plastic. ! If you use a Baby monitor, please, know that it is a piece of plastic which doesn't breath and will reflect the moisture back into the mattress. It can be a reason for moldy patch to appear. To avoid it please make a woolen cover for the monitor pad or put it under woolen blanket and under the mattress You will need to air regular those items.
item.excerpt:encoded: Medium Soft grade mattress 50mm thick. Featuring a Natural Latex Core. Our Medium Soft mattress gives excellent support and comfort created by an ingenious layering of natural materials.

item.title: Organic Wool Bassinet mattress
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Composition: organic cotton hemp cover, filled with layers of 100% NZ eco-wool 500gsm. Hand stitched.
Recommended to be used with Organic cotton sheet set ($60).
Sizes: 400mm x 800mm or 400mm x 760mm or 380mm x 800mm or any custom size and shape.
 
We also can make all bassinet mattresses in oval shape. We need you to send us a template (out of newspaper or plastic bag).
 
! If you use a Baby monitor, please, know that it is a piece of plastic which doesn't breath and will reflect the moisture back into the mattress. It can be a reason for moldy patch to appear. To avoid it please make a woolen cover for the monitor pad or put it under woolen blanket and under the mattress You will need to air regular those items.
item.excerpt:encoded: Medium grade mattress. Thickness is 25 -30mm when compresses down with a hand - it is a good thickness to make your little one comfortable and safe.  This mattress is an ideal option for any bassinet that has a solid wooden board support.

item.title: Organic NZ wool Cot mattress cover
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: The way we make our INNATURE Cot Mattresses, the outer layer, being unbleached organic cotton hemp fabric quilted with wool, it is designed to be spot washed whilst in place, rather than removed for machine washing. However, the cover can be easily removed and replaced for another baby. Our mattresses have proven themselves to be very durable and often used for multiple children. By replacing the mattress cover for a new baby, you create a hygienic and fresh start for your new baby.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:2:{s:4:"size";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:4:"Size";s:5:"value";s:47:"10 x 69 x 129cm | 10 x 60 x 120cm | custom size";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}s:5:"cover";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:5:"Cover";s:5:"value";s:35:"INNATURE Organic Cot mattress cover";s:8:"position";s:1:"1";s:10:"is_visible";i:0;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Organic NZ wool Cot mattress protector
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Our Cot Mattress Protector can be machine-washed. We recommend gentle mode, cold water, eco-wool detergent, no fast spin and dry on the line. Combo price for any firmness Cot Mattress + Cot Mattress protector is $450 (save $20)
item.excerpt:encoded: We strongly recommend protection for your cot mattress with our INNATURE Cot Mattress Protector made from organic wool quilted in organic cotton casing. This underlay is 100% natural, and is totally free from chemical finishes and synthetic fibres. It has very good absorption qualities, keeping your mattress dry in the event of small accidents.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{s:7:"options";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:7:"Options";s:5:"value";s:101:"Organic NZ wool Cot mattress protector | Combo for any firmness Cot Mattress + Cot Mattress protector";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Organic Cot mattress. Medium
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Composition: The mattress core is made of 90mm natural latex of medium density with a 100% cotton inner cover. All layers are hand stitched together (no glues are required), and finished with a zipped organic cotton hemp fabric cover that is quilted with 250gsm NZ wool wadding. This Cot Mattress cover can be removed and exchanged for a new cover to create a fresh start for the next child.
Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.
 
! If you use a Baby monitor, please, know that it is a piece of plastic which doesn't breath and will reflect the moisture back into the mattress. It can be a reason for moldy patch to appear. To avoid it please make a woolen cover for the monitor pad or put it under woolen blanket and under the mattress You will need to air regular those items.
 
Sizes:
Thickness approx. 100mm
690mm x 1290mm
600mm x 1200mm
or custom sized to your requirements
 
Combo price for any firmness Cot Mattress + Cot Mattress protector is $450 (save $20)
item.excerpt:encoded: Medium grade mattress This is a a bit softer then Medium firm - has 100% Organic Latex core (no coconut fibre at the middle), yet still very supportive mattress. It is often chosen by those who prefer a softer mattress (but within safety requirements), so as parents choose the same for their babies.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{s:7:"options";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:7:"Options";s:5:"value";s:96:"INNATURE Medium Soft Cot mattress | Combo for any firmness Cot Mattress + Cot Mattress protector";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Organic Cot mattress. Firm
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Composition: The mattress core is made of 75mm coconut fibre. Surrounding the core is 500gsm NZ eco-wool with a 100% cotton inner cover. All layers are hand stitched together (no glues are required), and finished with an additional zipped organic cotton hemp fabric cover that is quilted with 250gsm NZ wool wadding. This Cot Mattress cover can be removed and exchanged for a new cover to create a fresh start for the next child.
Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.
 
! If you use a Baby monitor, please, know that it is a piece of plastic which doesn't breath and will reflect the moisture back into the mattress. It can be a reason for moldy patch to appear. To avoid it please make a woolen cover for the monitor pad or put it under woolen blanket and under the mattress You will need to air regular those items.
 
Sizes:
Thickness approx. 100mm
690mm x 1290mm
600mm x 1200mm
or custom sized to your requirements
 
Combo price for any firmness Cot Mattress + Cot Mattress protector is $450 (save $20)
item.excerpt:encoded: Firm grade mattress Featuring a Coconut Coir Fibre Core. Our Firm mattress gives excellent spinal support created by an ingenious layering of natural materials. INNATURE are New Zealand’s only producer of mattresses featuring the coconut fibre core. Combined with pure NZ eco-wool and organic cotton hemp fabric, our Firm Cot Mattress is very breathable and supportive for your baby.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{s:7:"options";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:7:"Options";s:5:"value";s:80:"Firm Cot mattress | Combo for any firmness Cot Mattress + Cot Mattress protector";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Organic Cot mattress. Medium Firm. Our bestseller!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Composition: The mattress core is made of 30mm natural latex, 30mm coconut fibre, and 30mm natural latex. Surrounding the core is 500gsm NZ eco-wool with a 100% cotton inner cover. All layers are hand stitched together (no glues are required), and finished with a zipped organic cotton hemp fabric cover that is quilted with 250gsm NZ wool wadding. This Cot Mattress cover can be removed and exchanged for a new cover to create a fresh start for the next child.
Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.
 
! If you use a Baby monitor, please, know that it is a piece of plastic which doesn't breath and will reflect the moisture back into the mattress. It can be a reason for moldy patch to appear. To avoid it please make a woolen cover for the monitor pad or put it under woolen blanket and under the mattress You will need to air regular those items.
 
Sizes:
Thickness approx. 100mm
690mm x 1290mm
600mm x 1200mm
or custom sized to your requirements
 
Combo price for any firmness Cot Mattress + Cot Mattress protector is $450 (save $20)
item.excerpt:encoded: Medium Firm grade mattress Featuring a Coconut Coir Fibre and Natural Latex Core. This is our best selling cot mattress, admired for its comfort and long lasting support.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{s:7:"options";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:7:"Options";s:5:"value";s:87:"Medium Firm Cot mattress | Combo for any firmness Cot Mattress + Cot Mattress protector";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Organic cover Shiatsu Mat. Traditional...
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
5cm thick.
Composition: Organic cotton and hemp fabric cover, made of 3 layers of 100% cotton unbleached wadding, hand stitched.
Suitable for sleeping directly on the floor. Designed to be used for shiatsu sessions. It needs to be rolled away every time after use and aired frequently.
Can also come with additional 100% cotton canvas washable additional cover with zipper in color of your choice (see the colors panel on the bottom of the page).
item.excerpt:encoded: The ‘traditional’ futon – a firm, basic mattress for shiatsu sessions or any other types of massage where solid support and comfort is required.

item.title: "GYPSY" SLAT BED BASE
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
Can be set as basic/low frame for case of small children and then risen on legs with headboard later on…
Available in natural pine only with standard pine headboard. Can come low 30cm, medium 35cm and high 37cm.
item.excerpt:encoded: Inexpensive, clean, simple lines in solid slats comes in choice of low, medium or high leg height options. Easy to dismantle for transport or storage. As we sell this frame very close to cost price it can be purchased only together with INNATURE Futon or INNATURE Natural Mattress.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{s:5:"sizes";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:5:"Sizes";s:5:"value";s:157:"Single 90 x 190cm or 90 x 200cm | King Single 105 x 200cm | Double 135 x 200cm or 135 x 190cm | Queen 150 x 200cm | King 165 x 200cm | Super King 180 x 200cm";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: "CUBI" SLAT BED FRAME
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded: Height options: low 32cm, standard 35cm, high 40cm. Comes with solid slats system. Recommended with INNATURE Natural Mattresses and Futon mattresses. Can be also made with flexible slats for additional $175 (queen and double sizes), $200 (king and super king sizes).
item.excerpt:encoded: Beautifully made our of high quality furniture grade timber. No knots, all clear, with strong German hardware and strong “T” profile middle rail. Finished with Natural oil. Can come with metal or wooden legs.

Can be also made with flexible slats for additional $175 (queen and double sizes), $200 (king and super king sizes). We have a range of Side Tables. “Flying” side tables cost additional $180 for pair. Very cool looking and practical.

This design includes features often asked by customers – massive legs, extended headboard.
Beautifully made our of high quality furniture grade timber.
Every INNATURE bed frame comes fitted with very strong German hardware and “T” profile middle rail, finished with Natural oil. Solid Pine slats.

Combo: Bed base + 10cm Organic cover cotton wool futon + Cotton Canvas cover with zipper - SAVE UP TO $150.00 Combo: Bed base + 10cm Natural Latex 30mm cotton/wool futon + Cotton canvas cover with zipper - SAVE UP TO $305.00

We have different colors Cotton canvas covers available.

Space saving and comfortable.
Opens lengthwise to become a bed.

item.title: Organic Natural Latex Child mattress (125mm or 150mm thick). Medium.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Composition: natural latex core, medium density (100mm) surrounded with layers of 500g NZ eco-wool, and a 100% cotton inner cover. All layers are hand stitched together, and finished with a zipped organic cotton hemp fabric cover that is quilted with 500gsm NZ eco-wool wadding.
Recommended to be used with the Organic Wool Mattress Protector/underlay and a Brolly Sheet in times of toilet training.
item.excerpt:encoded: This mattress boasts a 100mm or 125mm (for teenagers) solid natural latex core, widely recognised for its orthopaedic quality in relief of pressure points and promoting good blood circulation. Its supportive firmness and durability provide excellent spinal alignment and comfort for your child’s changing body.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{s:4:"size";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:4:"Size";s:5:"value";s:561:"125mm thick Natural Latex core (100mm) Single Mattress 90 x 190cm or 90 x 200cm | 125mm thick Natural Latex core (100mm) King Single Mattress 105 x 200cm | 125mm thick Natural Latex core (100mm) Double Mattress 135 x 190cm or 135 x 200cm | 150mm thick Natural Latex core (125mm) Single Mattress 90 x 190cm or 90 x 200cm (recommended for teenagers) | 150mm thick Natural Latex core King Single Mattress (125mm) 105 x 200cm (recommended for teenagers) | 150mm thick Natural Latex core (125mm) Double Mattress 135 x 190cm or 135 x 200cm (recommended for teenagers)";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Organic Natural Coco Latex Child mattress (125mm thick). Firm.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Composition: coconut fibre and latex core (of 25mm latex/ 50mm coco fibre/ 25mm latex) surrounded with layers of 500g NZ eco-wool, and a 100% cotton inner cover. All layers are hand stitched together, and finished with a zipped organic cotton hemp fabric cover that is quilted with 500gsm NZ eco-wool wadding.
Recommended to be used with the Organic Wool Mattress Protector/underlay and a Brolly Sheet in times of toilet training.
item.excerpt:encoded: Featuring coconut coir fibre and natural latex core, our Medium Firm Kids Mattress gives excellent spinal support created by an ingenious layering of natural materials. These materials create a fully breathable bed, helping your child to maintain an even body temperature, and thereby helping them to fully rest.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{s:4:"size";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:4:"Size";s:5:"value";s:197:"Natural Coco Latex core Single Mattress 90 x 190cm or 90 x 200cm | Natural Coco Latex core King Single Mattress 105 x 200cm | Natural Coco Latex core Double size Mattress 135 x 200cm or 135 x 190cm";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

item.title: Brolly Sheets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This product is non-PVC, and not dressed with water resistant chemicals, and so does not carry a strong odour as some of the wool protectors do, when they get wet. This is why we recommend it as the safest option for our children. The Brolly Sheet can be easily machine-washed and tumble dried. It features tuck in wings to hold it firmly in place on the mattress.
We stock White, Pink and Blue Brolly Sheets.
item.excerpt:encoded:
To prevent wetness reaching your INNATURE Kids Mattress, we recommend using a Brolly Sheet during times when extra protection it is preferred.
We have thoroughly surveyed current options for full moisture protection, and found that this 100% cotton top protective sheet is the best available. The Brolly Sheet is fully waterproof, with a breathable PUL (Polyurethane Laminate) backing, which is soft and quiet.

item.title: ORGANIC fabric Natural fibre Feeding Pillow
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our INNATURE Organic Fabric Breast Feeding Pillow features:
  • 100% natural materials, organic cotton hemp fabric cover and 100% pure NZ eco-wool
  • Curved shape for safe and comfortable breastfeeding
  • Suitable for single and twin breastfeeding
  • While your breastfeeding you and baby are not exposed to chemical residue or off-gassing of synthetic fibres
  • Supportive to mothers posture and provides space for the baby to relax and rest in between and after feeding
  • Clip on belt is adjustable to different sizes
  • Cover is removable for washing
  • This pillow is also suitable as a support for babies as they learn to sit
Size of the pillow: 110mm x 660mm x 480mm
item.excerpt:encoded:
The INNATURE Organic Fabric Breast Feeding Pillow
is made from organic cotton hemp fabric and 100% pure wool. It curves around your waist and clips securely with a strap. This clever design provides fantastic support, bringing your baby to a comfortable level for feeding while giving relief to your arms and back.
This product came about when we were was asked by a friend to design something better than the conventional synthetic fibre feeding pillows. She wanted a pillow that wouldn’t slip away when she needed to reach for a napkin or glass of water, something that was secure and supportive for her back and allowed her to relax completely.
Our design is naturally safe and comfortable for both mother and baby. Your little one can be totally supported on the pillow whilst feeding, allowing you both to fully enjoy the precious time of feeding.

item.title: Natural Latex Mattress Topper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Wool layer provides the optimal sleeping climate by harmonizing your body’s temperature and humidity changes. Helps to relieve back pains, arthritis pains, and painful pressure points. Biodegradable and healthy for the planet.Completely breathable and a temperature regulator. Naturally Hypoallergenic & dust mite resistant.
Can also come in "wool FREE" edition. Please, ask for a quote.

item.title: Roll up futon mattress
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
7.5cm thick.
Made of Organic cotton and hemp fabric cover, 2 layers of 100% cotton unbleached wadding and 3 layers of 500gsm eco NZ wool, hand stitched.
This mattress constructed to be used directly on the floor (in case of wooden floor, woolen carpet is recommended) or sleeping platform – tatamis . Combination of layers of wool and cotton adds additional comfort. This mattress needs to be rolled up every night to give it time to breath out trapped moisture, which comes into the mattress from human body.
Can be folded “S” shape for storage.
Can also come with additional 100% cotton canvas washable additional cover with zipper in color of your choice (see the colors panel image). Prices are: Single & King Single - $120, Double & Queen - $185, King & Super King - $215.
item.excerpt:encoded:
It is close to "traditional" futon but adapted for NZ climate: not only cotton used but layers of wool which adds breathability and more comfort. This mattress constructed to be used directly on the floor (in case of wooden floor, woolen carpet is recommended) or sleeping platform – tatamis.
Can be folded “S” shape for storage. Designed for NZ climate.

item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:

Can also come with additional 100% cotton canvas washable additional cover with zipper in color of your choice (see the colors panel image). Prices are: Single & King Single - $120, Double & Queen - $185, King & Super King - $215.
item.excerpt:encoded:
10cm thick.
It is a comfortable and more durable option. Should be used on solid slats bed base.
The Latex core at the middle keeps working and makes layers of cotton and wool to compress slower, it extends life time of the mattress and adds desirable comfort.
It is an ideal option to be used on Omni or Lida bed-settees as it is very comfortable to sit on and very comfortable to sleep on.

Child pillow's thickness can be customised appropriate to the age if requested. Child thickness usually (2 layers of wool and 1 layer of cotton).
item.excerpt:encoded: This pillow made of 2 layers 500gsm NZ eco wool and 1 layers of cotton. Can come in different thickness. Very popular pillow! Provides support and comfort.

item.title: Premium Quality “Princess wool” Organic Wool Duvet inners for kids
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
• Pure organic sheep’s carded wool filling
  • 100% organic cotton cover
  • Naturally hypoallergetic and safe
  • Resistant to dust mites
  • Eliminates thermal imbalance
  • Lightweight all-seasons duvets
  • Proudly made in New Zealand
Can come in all sizes (including custom sizes) and in variety of weights.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Our bodies are constantly fighting the toxins found in the products around us. With Organic Duvets inner, you help to create environments in your bed that allow the body’s defense system a change to recuperate. Organic products are good for you and your family as well as environment. We also sell Organic pillows, mattress overlays/protectors and Organic cotton bedding.

Better sleep naturally…

item.title: "SPINE HEALTH" Organic Coco Latex Mattress. Medium Firm
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
"Spine Health" - Medium Firm Grade Mattress

Composition: the core is made of 35mm natural latex, 75mm coconut coir (coco) fibre core, 35mm natural latex 500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding natural latex and coco fibre core) 100% cotton inner cover encase all materials , all layers are hand stitched together (no glues are used). Then this mattress finished with unbleached organic cotton 45% & hemp 55% fabric which is quilted with 500gsm NZ wool wadding cover with zipper. It has only 10mm more of Natural Latex on each side compare with Firm mattress and that adds a little bit more "give" but it is still a Firm mattress.:-) It is a firm but comfortable mattress and often preferred by customers who loves firm beds and seeking straight spine alignment and good firm support for low back. It is very often preferred by tradesmen and athletic people as a good firm support for low back is important for a good rest. Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.
item.excerpt:encoded: 7″ (175mm) thick INNATURE Organic Coco Latex mattress featuring a 150mm core made of layers Organic Natural Latex in Medium density and rubberised with Natural Latex Coconut fibre coir core at the middle in Firm density, wool around, internal cotton cover, Organic cotton hemp quilted with 500gsm cover with zipper. Featuring a Coconut Coir Fibre and Natural Latex Core. Our Firm mattress and  Medium firm mattress gives excellent spinal support created by an ingenious layering of natural materials.
item.category: Natural Latex Mattresses and Coco Latex Mattresses

item.title: Premium Organic wool Mattress Overlay for Kids
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
• Pure organic sheep’s wool fill in 100% organic cotton cover. Beautifully quilted.
  • Naturally hypoallergenic & dust mite resistant
  • Eliminates thermal imbalance
  • Good protection for you mattress
  • Calms the body and lowers the heart rate
  • Helps to relieve back pains, arthritis pains, and painful pressure points
  • Naturally flame resistant and safe for kids
  • Biodegradable and healthy for the planet
item.excerpt:encoded:
Cozy and warm! Ads comfort and softness to the mattress! Excellent quality! Proudly made in NZ.
Elastic on the corner. Can be machine washed: gentle wash with Eco wool detergent. No spin, dry on the line.

item.title: "COMFI" Organic Latex Mattress. Medium Soft.
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
"comfi" - Medium Soft

Composition: The core is 150mm Natural Latex medium soft-density 75kg/m3 (in contrast with "BALANCE" - the medium mattress - 85kg/m3  or "CLOUD" - the soft density latex core - 65kg/m3), 500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding natural latex core), then 100% cotton inner cover encase all materials , all layers are hand stitched together (no glues are used). Then this mattress finished with unbleached organic cotton 45% & hemp 55% fabric which is quilted with 500gsm NZ wool wadding cover with zipper. Most suitable for people who prefer contour support in a mattress with a good give to accommodate a hip curve, shoulder - and take your body line. Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.

item.title: "BALANCE" Organic Latex Mattress. Medium. Bestseller!
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
"BALANCE" - Medium - best selling mattress!

Composition: The core is 150mm Natural Latex medium-density measures 80-85kg/m3 (in contrast with "COMFI" - the medium soft mattress - 75kg/m3  or "CLOUD" - the soft density latex core - 65kg/m3), 500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding natural latex core), then 100% cotton inner cover encase all materials , all layers are hand stitched together (no glues are used). Then this mattress finished with unbleached organic cotton 45% & hemp 55% fabric which is quilted with 500gsm NZ wool wadding cover with zipper. Most suitable for people who prefer supportive mattress with some give to accommodate hip curve and shoulder - the balance between support and comfort. Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.

item.title: "CLOUD" Organic Latex Mattress. Soft.
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
"cloud" - Soft

Composition: The core is 150mm Natural Latex Soft-density 60-65kg/m3 (in contrast with "BALANCE" - the medium mattress - 85kg/m3  or "COMFI" - the medium soft density latex core - 75kg/m3), 500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding natural latex core), then 100% cotton inner cover encase all materials , all layers are hand stitched together (no glues are used). Then this mattress finished with unbleached organic cotton 45% & hemp 55% fabric which is quilted with 500gsm NZ wool wadding cover with zipper. Most suitable for people who prefer a gentle contour support in a mattress with a good give to accommodate a hip curve, shoulder and take your body line with minimum pressure points. Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.
item.category: Natural Latex Mattresses and Coco Latex Mattresses

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:1:{s:4:"size";a:6:{s:4:"name";s:4:"Size";s:5:"value";s:212:"Single 90 x 190cm or 90 x 200cm | King Single 105 x 200cm | Double 135 x 190cm or 135 x 200cm | Queen size 150 x 200cm | King size 165 x 200cm | Super King size 180 x 200cm | Super king Size split in 2 Mattresses";s:8:"position";s:1:"0";s:10:"is_visible";i:1;s:12:"is_variation";i:1;s:11:"is_taxonomy";i:0;}}

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I recently purchased a "Cloud" mattress from Innature. Every part of the buying process was a positive experience. As soon as I stepped into their new show room Sukhita greeted me with a friendly smile. We talked about what I was looking for and I spent quite a bit of time rolling around on their display beds to find out which one was right for me. I had already picked a frame from their website which I found very user friendly and informative. It took about 10 days for the mattress and frame to be made up. It was on a rainy evening when it got delivered. The mattress was perfectly wrapped not to get wet. Sukhita set up the slat bed and together we put the mattress on. Since that day I have been truly sleeping on a cloud. No more waking up, tossing and turning and feeling achy in the morning. I highly recommend these natural wool covered latex mattresses and I definitely recommend Innature because of their genuinely friendly service. One more thing.....I love their wool pillows, too, so does my little 2 1/2 year old granddaughter :)

item.title: "Firm" Organic Coco Latex Mattress. Firm.
item.dc:creator: InNature
item.content:encoded:
"Firm" - Firm Grade Mattress

Composition: the core is made of 25mm natural latex, 75mm coconut coir (coco) fibre core, 25mm natural latex 500gsm NZ wool wadding (surrounding natural latex and coco fibre core) 100% cotton inner cover encase all materials , all layers are hand stitched together (no glues are used). Then this mattress finished with unbleached organic cotton 45% & hemp 55% fabric which is quilted with 500gsm NZ wool wadding cover with zipper. It is truly a firm mattress and often preferred by Asian customers who used to sleep on very firm beds or by Europeans and Kiwis who loves this option. Recommended to be used with Organic wool mattress protector.
item.excerpt:encoded: 6″ (150mm) thick INNATURE Organic Coco Latex mattress featuring a 150mm core made of layers Organic Natural Latex in Medium density and rubberised with Natural Latex Coconut fibre coir core at the middle in Firm density, wool around, internal cotton cover, Organic cotton hemp quilted with 500gsm cover with zipper. Featuring a Coconut Coir Fibre and Natural Latex Core. Our Firm mattress and  Medium firm mattress gives excellent spinal support created by an ingenious layering of natural materials.
